of the photographic discs 
of <u>Polaris <\u> and of the four 
stars forming the <u>Trapez-
ium<\u> in Orion. The diameters 
are given in micro-divisions 
and relate only to the dark 
or black centre of the star 
image, excluding the 
shading from the measurements.
The table and photo-
graph explain each other 
and will be understood on 
inspection. We will therefore 
proceed to consider what 
may be inferred from them.
The image of <u>Polaris <\u>
on 6th May (see table and 
photo.) with an exposure of 
<u>one second <\u> measured
